title: News about Redis: 2.8 is shaping, I'm back on Cluster.
description: This is a very busy moment for Redis because the new year started in a very interesting way:

title: WebKit is the jQuery of Browser Engines
description: The news has just come out that Opera is switching all of their browsers (both mobile and desktop) to use WebKit (specifically, Chromium). I’ve seen a lot of gnashing of teeth on Twitter and I feel like I can respond because I use to feel the same way back in 2008-2009. However this is 2013 […]
